name: Battle Chess 3D
description:
Battle Chess is 3D humanoid chess game, cool animation in action, multi game mode: singe with 3 difficult levels, 2 players, play online with stranger or friends.
Batte Chess features:
- Currently has 5 amazing 3D humanoid chess set: Barbarian, Dwarf, Skeleton, Orcs and Spartan.
- Single play with 3 difficult AI levels
- Two players Mode
- Play online: quick game with strange people or invite your friend to a match.
